member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.Bookmark
member.summary: Represents a bookmarked position of an instance.

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.Bookmark.Empty
member.summary: Singleton. Represents an unpositioned navigator.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.IsChildPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the specified child path represent a (direct/grand) child of the specified parent path.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.GetParentPath(System.String)

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.IsRootPath(System.String)

member.summary: Determines if the specified element path represents a (modifier) extension element.

member.summary: Returns the root component of the specified element path.

member.returns: A root path.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.ReplacePathRoot(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replace the root component of the specified element path.
member.param: An element path.
The new path root.
member.returns: An element path.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.NumberOfParts(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the hierarchical depth of the specified element path, i.e. the number of path segments.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.GetLastPathComponent(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the last path component of the specified element path, or the empty string.

member.summary: Determines if the specified element path represents a choice type element.
member.returns: true if ends with [x], or false otherwise.

member.summary: Determines if an element name matches a choice element name in the base profile.

An element name.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.IsCandidateBasePath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the specified element path matches a base element path.
member.param: A base element path.
An derived element path.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.IsResliceName(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the specified element name represents a reslice: "slice/reslice[/reslice2...]".

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.GetBaseSliceName(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the name of the base slice from a reslicing constraint name.
member.returns: The name of the base slice, or null.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.IsDirectResliceOf(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the specified slice name represents a reslice of an existing slice.
member.param: The name of the candidate slice.
The name of an existing slice.
member.returns: true if is a reslice of , or false otherwise.

example.code:
IsDirectResliceOf("A/B", "A") == true
IsDirectResliceOf("A", "A") == false IsDirectResliceOf("B/A", "A") == false IsDirectResliceOf("A/B/C", "A") == false

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.IsResliceOf(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the specified slice name represents a (nested) reslice of an existing slice.
member.param: The name of the candidate slice.
The name of an existing slice.
member.returns: true if is a (nested) reslice of , or false otherwise.

example.code:
IsResliceOf("A/B", "A") == true IsResliceOf("A/B/C", "A") == true
IsResliceOf("A", "A") == false IsResliceOf("B/A", "A") == false

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.IsSiblingSliceOf(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the specified slice names represent sibling slices.
member.returns: true if represents a sibling slice of , or false otherwise.

example.code:
IsSiblingSliceOf("A", "B") == true IsSiblingSliceOf("A", null) == true IsSiblingSliceOf("A/1", "A/2") == true
IsSiblingSliceOf("A", "A") == false IsSiblingSliceOf("A/1", "A") == false

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.PathName
member.summary: Get the name of the current node, based on the last part of the part
member.returns: The name or String.Empty if the navigator is not located on a node

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.ParentPath
member.summary: Get the parent path of the current node

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.Path
member.summary: Get the full path of the current node
member.returns: The path or String.Empty if the navigator is not located on a node

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.InsertAfter(Hl7.Fhir.Model.ElementDefinition)
member.summary: Inserts the element passed in as a sibling to the element the navigator is currently on. The navigator will move to the inserted element.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.InsertFirstChild(Hl7.Fhir.Model.ElementDefinition)
member.summary: Inserts the element passed in as a child of the element the navigator is currently on. The navigator will move to the inserted element.
member.remarks: You can only insert a child for an element does not have children yet.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator.ToListOfElements

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementNavigatorSlicingExtensions.IsRenamedChoiceTypeElement(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the element with the specified name represents a type slice for the current (choice) element.
member.returns: true if the element name represents a type slice of the current element, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementNavigatorSlicingExtensions.MoveToNextSliceAtAnyLevel(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator)
member.summary: Advance the navigator to the immediately following slicing constraint in the current slice group, at any (re)slicing level. Skip any existing child elements. Otherwise remain positioned at the current element.
member.returns: true if succesful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementNavigatorSlicingExtensions.MoveToNextSliceAtAnyLevel(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator,System.String)
member.summary: Advance the navigator forward to the slicing constraint in the current slice group with the specified slice name. Otherwise remain positioned at the current element.
member.returns: true if succesful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementNavigatorSlicingExtensions.MoveToNextSlice(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator)
member.summary: Advance the navigator to the next slice in the current slice group and on the current slicing level. Skip any existing child elements and/or child reslicing constraints. Otherwise remain positioned at the current element.
member.returns: true if succesful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementNavigatorSlicingExtensions.MoveToPreviousSlice(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator)
member.summary: Advance the navigator to the previous slice in the current slice group and on the current slicing level. Skip any existing child elements and/or child reslicing constraints. Otherwise remain positioned at the current element.
member.returns: true if succesful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementNavigatorSlicingExtensions.MoveToFirstReslice(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator)
member.summary: Advance the navigator to the first reslice of the current named slice. Skip any existing child elements and/or child reslicing constraints. Otherwise remain positioned at the current element.
member.returns: true if succesful, false otherwise.

member.summary: Enumerate any succeeding direct child slices of the specified element. Skip any intermediate child elements and re-slice elements. When finished, return the navigator to the initial position.
member.param: Specify true for finding direct (simple) slices, or false for finding re-slices.
member.returns: A sequence of instances.

member.summary: Recursively clone the current element and all it's children and return a new navigator for the resulting subtree.

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.DifferentialTreeConstructor
member.summary: Differential structures may contain paths that "skip" over parents. For our profile expansion logic, it's easier to have the skipped parents present. This class will insert these missing parents. Notice that these parent are just "stand ins", there's no slicing or ElementDefn information associated with them, so they should not have any influence on the final snapshot form.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.DifferentialTreeConstructor.MakeTree(System.Collections.Generic.List{Hl7.Fhir.Model.ElementDefinition})
member.summary: Create a valid tree structure from a sparse differential element list by adding missing parent element definitions.
member.returns: A tree structure representing the differential component.
member.remarks: This method returns a new list of element definitions. The input elements list is not modified.

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.ElementDefnMerger
member.summary: Private static helper for . Merge two instances and all their properties.

member.summary: Merge two instances. Existing diff properties override associated snap properties.

member.summary: Notify clients about a snapshot element with differential constraints.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.ElementDefnMerger.mergePrimitiveAttribute``1(``0,``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Merges two FHIR primitives. Normally this means the diff overrides the snap, but if the diffd is a string, and it start with ellipsis ('...'), the diff is appended to the snap.

The element to expand. Should be part of .
member.returns: A new, expanded list of instances.

The element to expand. Should be part of .
member.returns: A new, expanded list of instances.

member.summary: Expand the differential component of the specified structure and return the expanded element list. The given structure is not modified.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.expandElement(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator)
member.summary: Expand the currently active element within the specified instance. If the element has a name reference, then merge from the targeted element. Otherwise, if the element has a custom type profile, then merge it.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.merge(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator,Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator)
member.summary: Merge children of the currently selected element from differential into snapshot.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.copyChildren(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator,Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator,Hl7.Fhir.Model.StructureDefinition)
member.summary: Copy child elements from to . Remove existing annotations, fix Base components, notify listeners.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.IsEqualPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determine if the specified element paths are equal. Performs an ordinal comparison.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.IsEqualName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determine if the specified element names are equal. Performs an ordinal comparison.

member.name: E:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.Constraint
member.summary: An event that notifies clients when a differential constraint has been processed. The specified instance is the result of merging the base element with the associated differential constraint(s). The event handler can inspect and optionally modify the element. The result will be included in the snapshot.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.OnConstraint(Hl7.Fhir.Model.Element)
member.summary: Raise the event to notify the client that a differential constraint has been processed.
member.param: A reference to the snapshot element with merged differential constraints.

member.name: E:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.PrepareBaseProfile
member.summary: An event that notifies clients when a base profile has been resolved.
member.remarks: The event argument returns a reference to the original base profile instance as returned by the artifact source. Modifications to this instance will affect the original cached artifact and will be visible to other consumers of the artifact source.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.OnPrepareBaseProfile(Hl7.Fhir.Model.StructureDefinition,Hl7.Fhir.Model.StructureDefinition)
member.summary: Raise the event to notify the client when the associated base profile has been resolved and prepared for merging.
member.param: A profile instance.
The associated base profile instance.

member.name: E:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.PrepareElement
member.summary: An event that notifies clients when the generator initializes a new snapshot element. The specified element is cloned from the base profile and the base path has been fixed. The event handler can inspect and optionally modify the element. After the event handler returns, the snapshot generator merges the associated differential constraints, if they exist.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.OnPrepareElement(Hl7.Fhir.Model.ElementDefinition,Hl7.Fhir.Model.StructureDefinition,Hl7.Fhir.Model.ElementDefinition)
member.summary: Raise the event to notify the client when an element definition is being prepared for merging.

member.name: E:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.BeforeExpandElement
member.summary: An event that notifies clients when the snapshot generator must determine wether to expand a specific profile element. The event handler can inspect and optionally modify the flag. If the flag equals true, then the snapshot generator will expand the current element.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.OnBeforeExpandElement(Hl7.Fhir.Model.ElementDefinition,System.Boolean,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Raise the event to notify the client when deciding wether to expand the current element. The client can modify the value of the parameter to control expansion of specific elements. Warning: recursively expanding all profile elements may cause infinite recursion!

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGenerator.Outcome
member.summary: Returns null if the snapshot generation completed without issues. Otherwise returns a descriptive instance with a list of encountered issues.

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchAction
member.summary: Constants that indicate how a match should be processed.

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchAction.Merge
member.summary: Merge the elementdefinition in snap with the diff

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchAction.Add
member.summary: Add the elementdefinition to slice (with diff merged to the slicing entry base definition)

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchAction.Slice
member.summary: Begin a new slice with this slice as slicing entry

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchAction.New
member.summary: Introduce a new element (for core resource and datatype definitions).

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchAction.Invalid
member.summary: The element constraint is invalid and should be discarded.

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchInfo.Action
member.summary: Indicates how to handle this match: Merge | Add | Slice

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchInfo.BaseBookmark
member.summary: Represents an element in the base profile.

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchInfo.DiffBookmark
member.summary: Represents a matching element in the differential.

member.name: F:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.MatchInfo.Issue
member.summary: Returns optional matching error information.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.ElementMatcher.Match(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator,Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Navigation.ElementDefinitionNavigator)
member.summary: Match the children of the current element in diffNav to the children of the current element in snapNav.
member.param: A navigator for the user profile differential.
A navigator for the base profile snapshot.
member.returns: Returns a list of Bookmark combinations, the first bookmark pointing to an element in the base, the second a bookmark in the diff that matches the bookmark in the base.
member.remarks: Will match slices to base elements, re-sliced slices to slices and type-slice shorthands to choice elements. Note that this function may expand snapNav when it encounters paths in the differential that move into the complex types of one of snap's elements. (NO NEED, it just has to match direct children, not deeper) This function assumes the differential is not sparse: it must have parent nodes for all child constraint paths.

member.summary: Default configuration settings for the class.

member.summary: Default ctor.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGeneratorSettings.#ctor(Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGeneratorSettings)
member.summary: Clone ctor. Generates a new instance with the same state as the specified instance.

member.summary: Returns an exact clone of the current configuration settings instance.

member.summary: Copy all configuration settings to another instance.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGeneratorSettings.GenerateSnapshotForExternalProfiles
member.summary: If enabled (default), the snapshot generator will automatically generate the snapshot component of any referenced external profiles on demand if necessary. If disabled, then skip the merging of any external type profiles without a snapshot component.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGeneratorSettings.ForceRegenerateSnapshots
member.summary: Force expansion of all external profiles, disregarding any existing snapshot components. If enabled, the snapshot generator will re-generate the snapshot components of all the core resource and datatype profiles as well as of all other referenced external profiles. Re-generated snapshots are annotated to prevent duplicate re-generation (assuming the provided resource resolver uses caching). If disabled (default), then the snapshot generator relies on existing snapshot components, if they exist.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGeneratorSettings.GenerateExtensionsOnConstraints
member.summary:
Enable this setting to add a custom extension to elements and properties in the snapshot that are constrained by the differential with respect to the base profile.
Note that this extension only applies to the containing profile and should NOT be inherited by derived profiles. The FHIR API snapshot generator explicitly removes and re-generates these extensions for each profile. The class provides utility methods to read and/or remove the generated extensions.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGeneratorSettings.GenerateAnnotationsOnConstraints
member.summary: Enable this setting to annotate all elements and properties in the snapshot that are constrained by the differential.
member.remarks: The class provides utility methods to read and/or remove the generated annotations.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Snapshot.SnapshotGeneratorSettings.GenerateElementIds
member.summary: Enable this setting to automatically generate missing element id values.
member.remarks: The generated element ids conform to the STU3 FHIR specification. Do NOT enable this setting for DSTU2!

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipCacher
member.summary:
Internal class which gives access to files within a zip whilst avoiding unpacking that zip on every access. The ZipCacher will unpack the zip once and store the contents in a cache directory, serving files from this cache. When the ZipCacher detects the zip is more recent than its cache, it will update the cache directory automatically.
The ZipCacher will either use a different cache for each instance, or -given a persistent "cache key"- reuse the cache from a previous instantiation of ZipCacher. When using a shared cache over multiple ZipCachers with the/ same cacheKey, keep in mind that it uses the filesystem for its state, and is not thread-safe.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipCacher.GetContents
member.summary: Returns a list of files present in the zip, returning a full path to the file

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipCacher.IsActual
member.summary: Returns true if the ZipCacher has an up-to-date cache for the zip file it manages

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipCacher.getCachedZipDirectory
member.summary: Gets the cache directory, but does not create one if it does not yet exist

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipSource

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipSource.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets the search string to match against the names of files in the ZIP archive. The source will only provide resources from files that match the specified mask. The source will ignore all files that don't match the specified mask.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Specification.Source.ZipSource.prepare
member.summary: Unpacks the zip-file and constructs a new FileArtifactSource on the unzipped directory
member.remarks: This is an expensive operations and should be run once. As well, it unpacks files on the file system and is not thread-safe.

If true, then an abstract code is allowed to be used in the context of the code that is being validated.

member.summary: Parses a bindeable type into either a Coding (code, Coding, Quantity, string, uri) or CodeableConcept
member.returns: An object, which is either a Coding or CodeableConcept

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.IBucket.Add(Hl7.Fhir.ElementModel.IElementNavigator)
member.remarks: ensures the slice only tries to match the list of candidates in order: the first non-matching candidate ends further evaluation of the list of canidates. This improves performance for ordered slices.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.IBucket.Name
member.summary: The results of the last call to Receive().
member.remarks: Results are in the same order as the candidates passed in, and the result list will have the same number of elements.

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.PocoValidationExtensions
member.summary: Add support for validating against Base subclasses (instead of IElementNavigator) to the Validator

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ProfileAssertion.Resolve
member.summary: Resolves the StructureDefinitions referred to by the given canonicals, and adds them to the list of StructureDefinitions available to the preprocessor

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ProfileAssertion.Validate
member.summary: Validates the instance type, declared and stated profiles for consistenty.

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ProfilePreprocessor.GenerateSnapshots(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Hl7.Fhir.Model.StructureDefinition},System.Func{Hl7.Fhir.Model.StructureDefinition,Hl7.Fhir.Model.OperationOutcome},System.String)
member.summary: Generate snapshots for all StructureDefinitions available to the preprocessor

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ProfilePreprocessor.CreateNavigators(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Hl7.Fhir.Model.StructureDefinition})
member.summary: Generate navigators for all StructureDefinitions with snapshots available to the preprocessor

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ValidationSettings.GenerateSnapshot
member.summary: The validator needs StructureDefinitions to have a snapshot form to function. If a StructureDefinition without a snapshot is encountered, should the validator generate the snapshot from the differential present in the StructureDefinition? Default is 'false'.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ValidationSettings.GenerateSnapshotSettings
member.summary: If GenerateSnapshot is set to 'true', these settings will allow the user to configure how snapshot generation is done.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ValidationSettings.Trace
member.summary: Include informational tracing information in the validation output. Useful for debugging purposes. Default is 'false'.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ValidationSettings.SkipConstraintValidation
member.summary: StructureDefinition may contain FhirPath constraints to enfore invariants in the data that cannot be expresses using StructureDefinition alone. This validation can be turned off for performance or debugging purposes. Default is 'false'.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ValidationSettings.ResolveExteralReferences
member.summary: If a reference is encountered that references to a resource outside of the current instance being validated, this setting controls whether the validator will call out to the ResourceResolver to try to resolve the external reference. Note: References that refer to resources inside the current instance (i.e. contained resources, Bundle entries) will always be followed and validated.

member.name: P:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.ValidationSettings.EnableXsdValidation
member.summary: If set to true (and the XDocument specific overloads of validate() are used), the validator will run .NET XSD validation prior to running profile validation

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Validation.XmlValidationExtensions
member.summary: Add support for validating against Base subclasses (instead of IElementNavigator) to the Validator
